meanings.definition: R. Lee Ermey (1944–2018), American actor and Marine Corps drill instructor.
meanings.english_definition: R. Lee Ermey (1944–2018), American actor and Marine Corps drill instructor.
examples: R. Lee Ermey was famous for his role in Full Metal Jacket.

etymology.value: Likely a variant of Ermy, a pet form of Erasmus or Erminold.
